VersionInfo.Title: West Wind Markdown Monster 1.1.21 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
Recent updates have added Weblog Endpoint Discovery (rds), a new Snippets text expansion addin, an updated Addin manager, a new Addin Project Template, Auto-save and Auto-backups, print output from Html preview, a portable install, Vim and Emacs support, improved high DPI font scaling, improved native screen captures, support for pasting of images into the editor, support for multiple editor/preview sync modes and many small bug fixes and tweaks.
If you're upgrading from a version prior to 1.1, we recommend that you completely uninstall Markdown Monster and reinstall the new version to clear out files that are no longer used. Your existing configuration files will be updated.
For more detailed release info please see: https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/master/Changelog.md
